name: Escape From the Castle of Sad Ghosts
storyline: Sad ghosts have confused 'kidnapping' with 'making friends'. Try to escape without being seen or you'll hurt their feelings! They mean well, but they're dead and mixed-up.
summary: Escape from sad ghosts without hurting their feelings!
